summary: Provides an end‑to‑end image‑to‑image generation pipeline built on latent consistency models. It encodes source images into latent space, runs a diffusion process conditioned on textual prompts, decodes the refined latents back to images, and incorporates safety checking, adapter loading, and fine‑tuning capabilities.
business_intent: Enables developers and AI product teams to integrate high‑quality, controllable image‑to‑image generation into applications such as photo editing, style transfer, and creative content creation, while maintaining safety and customization options.
